name: Deadpedal
description:
Twelve racers from around the world are invited to compete in an underground race with one goal in mind, to win.

Deadpedal is a fast pace team based combat racing game. Team up with your friends for compete against each other to find out who's the best. 

Features:

  1. Splitscreen
  2. local co-op
  3. 8 maps
  4. Four Game Modes (Grand Prix, Combat Racing, Time Attack, King of the Crew)

This project is currently in development. Please feel free to join our discord and/or send us feedback on the game. We would greatly appreciate it. Thank you!
